title: 所有MC打不开，急！！
author: 少先队队员
txt_content:
本帖最后由 少先队队员 于 2015-1-29 21:01 编辑 

今天我的所有mc【1.6.4、1.7.2、1.7.10（都带forge）】统统崩溃，我在调试模式中实验依然打不开，输出日志如下（1.7.2，1.6.4的日志为空）：

[20:36:10] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[20:36:10] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[20:36:10] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[20:36:10] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.2.211.1121 for Minecraft 1.7.2 loading
[20:36:11] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM, version 1.8.0_31, running on Windows 7:x86:6.1, installed at C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_31
[20:36:11] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod lain.mods.inputfix.InputFix does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
[20:36:11] [main/INFO] [FML]: Loading tweaker optifine.OptiFineForgeTweaker from OptiFine_1.7.2_HD_U_D1[hukk汉化].jar
[20:36:11] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[20:36:11] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name optifine.OptiFineForgeTweaker
[20:36:11] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[20:36:11] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[20:36:11] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_31]
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.remove(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_31]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:117) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]


求解，谢谢，跪求！寒假没有minecraft怎么过？
系统版本：windows7
启动器版本:MCLauncher5.31
java版本：8u31








输出日志.txt


2015-1-29 20:47 上传
点击文件名下载附件




1.7 KB, 下载次数: 3

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content: 1L正解，日志内容简单的说就是java8不兼容。

replies.author: 青橘短衫丶
replies.txt_content: java不行，去把java8卸载了然后下载java7，因为我的世界只支持java7

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
M_Nick 发表于 2015-1-29 21:08
java不行，去把java8卸载了然后下载java7，因为我的世界只支持java7
你说旧版forge不兼容java8就算了。你有实验过么？我1.7.10 forge最新版用java8好好的
用JAVA7，java官网可以下载，或者百度java7

replies.author: 4O74Y74L74J7
replies.txt_content: 带Forge的MC1.6.4、1.7.2用java8会崩，楼主请再去安装一个java7

replies.author: qq330048980
replies.txt_content: 最好把java678都下载了  之后在启动器选择你需要的Java版本之后在启动     还是推荐BN启动器自动选择Java避免Java路径错误
